trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class is used with an LDAP search function to specify the server used to verify the existence of an object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> 類別 (Class) 與 LDAP 搜尋函式搭配使用，以指定用於驗證物件是否存在的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The global catalog the performs the validation.
trans-unit.target: 執行驗證的全域資料目錄。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class using the specified server name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor(System.String)" /> 建構函式使用指定的伺服器名稱，建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The global catalog that performs the validation.
trans-unit.target: 執行驗證的全域資料目錄。

trans-unit.source: The flags used for the validation.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class using the specified server name and flags.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)" /> 建構函式使用指定的伺服器名稱和旗標，建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.Flag" /> property contains the flag used for validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.Flag" /> 屬性包含用於驗證的旗標。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.GetValue" /> method returns the name of the validation server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.GetValue" /> 方法會傳回驗證伺服器的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the validation server.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.ServerName" /> property contains the name of the server that performs the validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.ServerName" /> 屬性包含執行驗證之伺服器的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server that performs the validation.
trans-unit.target: 執行驗證之伺服器的名稱。
